name.baseName: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site ; Biochar ; Coconut shell as raw material ; Agricultural land remediation ; In-situ stabilization
运输到场的材料和设备;生物炭;农田土壤;原位稳定化

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The process of transporting repair reagents to the site.

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: 800kg of biochar is transported from the production site to the repair site.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The study site is a paddy field contaminated by Cd, located inGongzhuang town, Huizhou city of the Pearl River Delta, Southern China.
研究地点位于中国南方珠江三角洲惠州市龚庄镇，是一片受镉污染的稻田。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The biochar transport distance data is calculated based on the production address of the reagent and remediation site.
基于生物炭的生产地址和修复场地的位置来计算修复药剂运输距离数据。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset pertains to an industrial process involving the production and transportation of biochar, specifically derived from coconut shells, for the purpose of in-situ stabilization and remediation of cadmium-contaminated paddy fields. The repair reagents, in this case, biochar, are used for agricultural land remediation, which helps to improve soil quality and reduce contaminant levels. This process is relevant for environmental initiatives focused on the restoration of agricultural land, particularly in areas affected by heavy metal pollution.
该数据集涉及的工业过程包括生产和运输生物炭，特别是源自椰壳的生物炭，用于镉污染稻田的原位稳定化和修复。修复药剂，在这种情况下是生物炭，用于农田土壤修复，有助于改善土壤质量和降低污染物水平。这个过程与专注于农业土地恢复的环境倡议相关，特别是在受重金属污染的地区。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Kai L ,Liping F ,Fangbai L , et al. Sustainability assessment and carbon budget of chemical stabilization based multi-objective remediation of Cd contaminated paddy field. The Science of the total environment, 2021, 819 152022-152022.

Kai L ,Liping F ,Fangbai L , et al. Sustainability assessment and carbon budget of chemical stabilization based multi-objective remediation of Cd contaminated paddy field. The Science of the total environment, 2021, 819 152022-152022.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset, it is crucial to account for the transport distance of biochar as it significantly affects the environmental impact assessment in the life cycle analysis. Users should also consider the specificity of the site, i.e., the cadmium-contaminated paddy fields in Gongzhuang town, Huizhou city of the Pearl River Delta, Southern China, as the dataset is tailored to this particular context. Additionally, attention must be given to each stage's inputs and outputs, which include materials, energy, resources, emissions, and carbon, to ensure comprehensive life cycle assessment.
使用此数据集时，必须考虑生物炭的运输距离，因为它会显著影响生命周期分析中的环境影响评估。用户还应考虑场地的特定性，即中国南方珠江三角洲惠州市龚庄镇受镉污染的稻田，因为数据集是针对这一特定背景量身定做的。另外，必须注意每个阶段的输入和输出，包括材料、能源、资源、排放和碳，以确保全面的生命周期评估。

completeness.common:other: Every stage contains materials, energy, resources, emission, and carbon input and output.
每个阶段都包含材料、能源、资源、排放以及碳的投入和产出。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Equipment and Materials Arriving on Site
